plot: Amy is trapped in a quarantine facility where time moves faster than in reality, while the Doctor is confined to the TARDIS. Can Rory save his wife in time?

Amy is trapped in a quarantine facility for victims of an alien plague which could kill the doctor in minutes if he were to catch it. So Rory is the only one who can go into the facility to save her but can he save her before she is killed by kindness?—Sasha Jones

Having arrived at their intended destination, the Doctor and Rory have to find Amy who finds herself in a treatment facility that treats a particular kind of plague - one to which the Doctor is particularly vulnerable and would kill him should he contract it. The Doctor stays behind in a quarantine facility while Rory sets off to find his wife. In his first encounter with Amy Rory learns that 36 years have past and the Doctor, who is staying in the protective confines of the TARDIS, admits the time lines may be a bit wobbly. He's certain that he can find the Amy from their own time but there is only one thing blocking them - the older Amy who doesn't want the last 36 years to never exist.—garykmcd
